member.name: T:Windows.Devices.Portable.ServiceDevice
member.summary: Provides methods for identifying a device service for a portable device that supports WPD (Windows Portable Devices) for device enumeration.

member.name: M:Windows.Devices.Portable.ServiceDevice.GetDeviceSelector(Windows.Devices.Portable.ServiceDeviceType)
member.summary: Returns an Advanced Query Syntax (AQS) string that is used to enumerate device services of the specified ServiceDeviceType. This string is passed to the FindAllAsync or CreateWatcher method.
member.param: The type of service to identify.

member.name: M:Windows.Devices.Portable.ServiceDevice.GetDeviceSelectorFromServiceId(System.Guid)
member.summary: An Advanced Query Syntax (AQS) string for identifying a device service by its GUIDs. This string is passed to the FindAllAsync or CreateWatcher method.

member.name: T:Windows.Devices.Portable.ServiceDeviceType
member.summary: Indicates the type of a portable device service.

member.name: F:Windows.Devices.Portable.ServiceDeviceType.CalendarService
member.summary: A service that provides calendar information.

member.name: F:Windows.Devices.Portable.ServiceDeviceType.RingtonesService
member.summary: A service that provides ringtones for a phone.

member.name: F:Windows.Devices.Portable.ServiceDeviceType.SmsService
member.summary: An short message service (SMS) messaging service.

member.name: T:Windows.Devices.Portable.StorageDevice
member.summary: Provides methods for accessing the storage functionality of a portable device that supports WPD. Removable storage devices include:USB mass storage flash drives and camerasMedia Transfer Protocol (MTP) music players, phones, and camerasPicture Transfer Protocol (PTP) cameras
member.capability: Required to read from and write to removable storage.

member.name: M:Windows.Devices.Portable.StorageDevice.FromId(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a StorageFolder object from a DeviceInformation Id for a removable storage device.
member.capability: Required to read from and write to removable storage.
member.returns: The storage folder object that represents the removable storage device and provides access to content on the device.
member.param: The DeviceInformation ID that identifies the removable storage device. This id can be retrieved from Windows.Devices.Enumeration or the DeviceInformationId property of the AutoPlay device event arguments. For more information, see Quickstart: Register an app for an AutoPlay device. In order for FromId to succeed, the app must declare both the removableStorage capability as shown in the App capability declarations and file type associations for the files it wishes to access on the device as shown in How to handle file activation. For more information, see the Removable Storage sample.

member.name: M:Windows.Devices.Portable.StorageDevice.GetDeviceSelector
member.summary: An Advanced Query Syntax (AQS) string for identifying removable storage devices. This string is passed to the FindAllAsync or CreateWatcher method.
member.capability: Required to read from and write to removable storage.
member.returns: An AQS string for identifying storage devices.
